mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payinfo(p_id, ord_code, mbsp_id, paymethod, payinfo, p_price, p_status) VALUES (seq_payinfo_id.NEXTVAL, #{ord_code}, #{mbsp_id}, #{paymethod}, #{payinfo}, #{p_price}, #{p_status})
mapper.select: SELECT p_id, ord_code, mbsp_id, paymethod, payinfo, p_price, p_status, p_date FROM payinfo WHERE ord_code = #{ord_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE payinfo SET p_price = ( SELECT SUM(dt_amount * dt_price) FROM ordetail_tbl WHERE ord_code = #{ord_code} ) WHERE ord_code = #{ord_code}
